channel.title: Ernest the chicken quest
channel.description:
Some information to those helping with the moparclassic project:
------------------------------------------------------------------ ...............Quest Id(7): Ernest the chicken............. -----------------------------------------------------------------
Quest Start: Veronica
Npc IDs: ID: 92 Ernest ID: 91 chicken ID: 38 Professor Oddenstein ID: 36 Veronica
Item IDs: ID: 178 poison fish food- coords: 212, 1497 ID: 175 pressure gauge ID: 213 rubber tube- coords: 208, 546 ID: 208 oil can- coords: 232, 3382 ID: 212 Closet key ID: 139 Burnt bread - coords: 209, 2442 ID: 166 Tinderbox - coords: 208, 2438 ID: 181 ashes - coords: 212, 2441 ID: 181 ashes - coords: 214, 2439 ID: 177 poison - coords: 221, 546 ID: 211 spade - coords: 197, 554 ID: 144 shears - coords: 200, 551 ID: 21 bucket - coords: 201, 552
object id: ID: 86 fountain - coords: 226, 565 ID: 134 compost heap - coords: 230, 552 ID: 88 approach tree ID: 124 LeverA - coords: 225, 3386 ID: 125 LeverB - coords: 222, 3382 ID: 126 LeverC - coords: 222, 3378 ID: 127 LeverD - coords: 223, 3375 ID: 128 Lever E - coords: 229, 3375 ID: 129 Lever F - coords: 230, 3376 ID: 32 door - coords: 223, 3381 ID: 27 door - coords: 225, 3379 ID: 25 door - coords: 225, 3376 ID: 33 door - coords: 226, 3381 ID: 30 door - coords: 226 , 3378 ID: 28 door - coords: 228, 3379 ID: 26 door - coords: 228, 3376 ID: 31 door - coords: 229, 3378 ID: 29 door - coords: 228, 3382
NPC Quest Stages:
Professor Oddenstein: 1) Talk to Professor Oddenstein(Stage 0) ------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/L4wwvN3W 2) Talk to Professor Oddenstein(Stage 1)------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/LRsfdef5 3) Retalking to Professor Oddenstein(Stage 2)------------------------- http://pastebin.com/4Lzr3mNs 4) Talking to Professor Oddenstein if you have "some of the things", but not all that he asked for(Stage 3)------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/raiK7qLj 5) Talking to Professor Oddenstein with all the things needed to start the machine up(Stage 4)-- http://pastebin.com/RbtUySEK 6) Talking to Professor Oddenstein after completing quest-------------- http://pastebin.com/L4wwvN3W
chicken: 1) talking to chicken(Stage 0) - "The Chicken doesnt appear interested in talking"
Veronica: 1)Talk to Veronica(Stage 0)--------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/zttmmvWS 2) Retalk to Veronica(Stage 1)------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/4nJPqSCp 3) Talking to Veronica after talking to Professor Oddenstein(Stage 2)---- http://pastebin.com/qgYq5f0n 4) Talking to Veronica after turning her husband back into a human(Stage 3)--- http://pastebin.com/XgS1WEij
fountain: 1) Search fountain(Stage 0)---------------------------------------- --- http://pastebin.com/04dWCkH1 2) Search fountain after using poison fish food on it(Stage 1)------- http://pastebin.com/fDT3fEKp 3) Search fountain (Stage 2)------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/j0JsCdEv
Using poison fish food on fountain---------------------------- http://pastebin.com/RQyPmWsQ
compost heap: 1)search compost heap(Stage 0)---------------- http://pastebin.com/FQPRhB8X
Use "spade" on compost heap: 1)Use spade on compost heap "before you start quest"------------------ http://pastebin.com/8B689kPJ 2)Use spade on compost heap Stage(1)--------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/QNprdVXu 3)Use spade on compost heap "after you finish quest" ------------------- http://pastebin.com/8B689kPJ
Levers: ***note: everytime u go up ladder it resets the levers, IF door ids arent listed that means they are locked...**** 1)IF lever A,B,C,D,E,F are up all doors are locked. 2)IF you pull lever A down, B down,C is up, D is up,E is up, F is up, it opens door id(32), door id(27) 3)IF you pull lever A down, B down, C down, D up, E up, F up it locks all doors 4)IF you pull lever A down, B down, C up, D down, E up, F up it opens door id(27), door id(28), door id(33), door id(32). 5)IF you pull lever A up, B down. C up, D down, E up, F up it opens door id(33), door id(28) 6)IF you pull lever A up, B up, C up, D down, E up, F up it opens door id(33), door id(28), door id(31), 7)If you pull lever A up, B up, C up, D down, E down, F up it opens door id(31) 8)If you pull lever A up, B up, C up, D down, E down, F down it opens door id(26), door id(25) 9)IF you pull lever A up, B up, C up, D up, E down, F down it opens door id(25) 10)IF you pull lever A up, B up, C down, D down, E down, F down it opens door id(25), door id(26) 11) IF you pull lever A up, B up, C down, D down, E up, F down it opens door id(26), door id(30), door id(33) 12)If you pull lever A down, B up, C down, D down, E up, F down it opens door id(29), door id(33), door id(30), door id(26) 13) If you pull lever A down, B up, C down, D down, E up, F up it opens door id(31), door id(28), door id(33) 14) If you pull lever A down, B down, C down, D down, E up, F Up it opens door id(33), door id(28) 15) If you pull lever A up, B down, C down, D down, E up, F up it opens door id(33), door id (28) 16) if you pull lever A up, B up, C down, D down, E up, F up it opens door id(33), door id (28), door id(31) 17) if you pull lever A up, B up, C down, D down, E down, F up it opens door id (31) 18) if you pull lever A up, B up, C down, D up, E down, F down it opens door id(25)
Rewards: 4 quest points
Notes: 1) if u approach tree: SendMessage("You are badly scratched by the tree"); -----------------player gets hit by trees 12s 2) note: everytime u go up ladder it resets the levers, IF door ids arent listed that means they are locked...****
-----------------------------------------------

item.title: Ernest the chicken quest
item.dc:creator: @Godandjesus Godandjesus
item.description:
@Godandjesus wrote:

RSC quests are still better than modern mmorpg quests, even the rewards were not that good.

Read full topic

item.title: Ernest the chicken quest
item.dc:creator: @marc110 marc110
item.description:
@marc110 wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

I remember this quest… without a guide… I got to the lever part and said screw it.

agreed i hate quests

Read full topic

item.title: Ernest the chicken quest
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

Some information to those helping with the moparclassic project:

…Quest Id(7): Ernest the chicken…

Quest Start: Veronica

Npc IDs:
ID: 92 Ernest
ID: 91 chicken
ID: 38 Professor Oddenstein
ID: 36 Veronica

ID: 178 poison fish food- coords: 212, 1497

ID: 29 door - coords: 228, 3382

NPC Quest Stages:

Professor Oddenstein:

  1. Talk to Professor Oddenstein(Stage 0) ------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/L4wwvN3W
  2. Talk to Professor Oddenstein(Stage 1)------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/LRsfdef5
  3. Retalking to Professor Oddenstein(Stage 2)------------------------- http://pastebin.com/4Lzr3mNs
  4. Talking to Professor Oddenstein if you have “some of the things”, but not all that he asked for(Stage 3)------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/raiK7qLj
  5. Talking to Professor Oddenstein with all the things needed to start the machine up(Stage 4)-- http://pastebin.com/RbtUySEK
  6. Talking to Professor Oddenstein after completing quest-------------- http://pastebin.com/L4wwvN3W

chicken:

  1. talking to chicken(Stage 0) - “The Chicken doesnt appear interested in talking”

Veronica:
1)Talk to Veronica(Stage 0)--------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/zttmmvWS
2) Retalk to Veronica(Stage 1)------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/4nJPqSCp
3) Talking to Veronica after talking to Professor Oddenstein(Stage 2)---- http://pastebin.com/qgYq5f0n
4) Talking to Veronica after turning her husband back into a human(Stage 3)— http://pastebin.com/XgS1WEij

fountain:

  1. Search fountain(Stage 0)---------------------------------------- — http://pastebin.com/04dWCkH1
  2. Search fountain after using poison fish food on it(Stage 1)------- http://pastebin.com/fDT3fEKp
  3. Search fountain (Stage 2)------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/j0JsCdEv

Using poison fish food on fountain---------------------------- http://pastebin.com/RQyPmWsQ

compost heap:
1)search compost heap(Stage 0)---------------- http://pastebin.com/FQPRhB8X

Use “spade” on compost heap:
1)Use spade on compost heap “before you start quest”------------------ http://pastebin.com/8B689kPJ
2)Use spade on compost heap Stage(1)--------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/QNprdVXu
3)Use spade on compost heap “after you finish quest” ------------------- http://pastebin.com/8B689kPJ

Levers: note: everytime u go up ladder it resets the levers, IF door ids arent listed that means they are locked…*
1)IF lever A,B,C,D,E,F are up all doors are locked.
2)IF you pull lever A down, B down,C is up, D is up,E is up, F is up, it opens door id(32), door id(27)
3)IF you pull lever A down, B down, C down, D up, E up, F up it locks all doors
4)IF you pull lever A down, B down, C up, D down, E up, F up it opens door id(27), door id(28), door id(33), door id(32).
5)IF you pull lever A up, B down. C up, D down, E up, F up it opens door id(33), door id(28)
6)IF you pull lever A up, B up, C up, D down, E up, F up it opens door id(33), door id(28), door id(31),
7)If you pull lever A up, B up, C up, D down, E down, F up it opens door id(31)
8)If you pull lever A up, B up, C up, D down, E down, F down it opens door id(26), door id(25)
9)IF you pull lever A up, B up, C up, D up, E down, F down it opens door id(25)
10)IF you pull lever A up, B up, C down, D down, E down, F down it opens door id(25), door id(26)
11) IF you pull lever A up, B up, C down, D down, E up, F down it opens door id(26), door id(30), door id(33)
12)If you pull lever A down, B up, C down, D down, E up, F down it opens door id(29), door id(33), door id(30), door id(26)
13) If you pull lever A down, B up, C down, D down, E up, F up it opens door id(31), door id(28), door id(33)
14) If you pull lever A down, B down, C down, D down, E up, F Up it opens door id(33), door id(28)
15) If you pull lever A up, B down, C down, D down, E up, F up it opens door id(33), door id (28)
16) if you pull lever A up, B up, C down, D down, E up, F up it opens door id(33), door id (28), door id(31)
17) if you pull lever A up, B up, C down, D down, E down, F up it opens door id (31)
18) if you pull lever A up, B up, C down, D up, E down, F down it opens door id(25)

Rewards: 4 quest points

Notes:

  1. if u approach tree: SendMessage(“You are badly scratched by the tree”); -----------------player gets hit by trees 12s
  2. note: everytime u go up ladder it resets the levers, IF door ids arent listed that means they are locked…****

Read full topic
